title: Microsoft Edge: Desktop Shortcut for New Enterprise Devices
description: For new enterprise devices, including Windows Enterprise SKUs, Windows Server SKUs and any domain-joined or AAD-joined devices, running through Windows Out of Box Experience (OOBE) for the first time will see a Microsoft Edge desktop shortcut automatically created. When enterprise users turn on their Windows 11 devices for the first time, they'll see the Edge shortcut on their desktop.  This desktop shortcut provides users with an alternative way to access their Microsoft Edge browser without needing to manually pin and configure their set-up.For new enterprise devices, including Windows Enterprise SKUs, Windows Server SKUs and any domain-joined or AAD-joined devices, running through Windows Out of Box Experience (OOBE) for the first time will see a Microsoft Edge desktop shortcut automatically created. When enterprise users turn on their Windows 11 devices for the first time, they'll see the Edge shortcut on their desktop.  This desktop shortcut provides users with an alternative way to access their Microsoft Edge browser without needing to manually pin and configure their set-up.
